title: Second Life
alternative_title: Di Er Ren Sheng; 第二人生
status: Di Er Ren Sheng; 第二人生
description:
Description :
        National idol Gu Ming is a cute and docile little sheep in front of others and a two-faced and quiet little demon behind their backs. The ordinary female lead unexpectedly swapped bodies with him and actually decided to "live the carefree life of a boy!" What should he do in order to return to his own body and life?

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 1: I've Become A Winner In Life?!
